Get food fast ‐ No fast food

Hello, we are Omnifood, your new premium food delivery service. We know you are always busy. No time for cooking. So let us take care of that. We are really good at it, we promise!

Up to 365 days a year

Never cook again! We really mean that. Our subscription plans include up to 365-days a year coverage. You can also choose to order more flexible if that's your style.

Ready in 20 minutes

You are only twenty minutes away from your delicious and super healthy meals delivered right to your home. We work with the best chefs in each town to ensure that your are 100% happy.

100% organic

All our vegetables are fresh, organic and local. Animals are raised without added hormones and antibiotics. Good for your health, the environment, and it also tastes better!.

Order anything

We don't limit your creativity, which means you can order whatever you feel like. You can also choose from our menu containing over 100 delicious meals. It's up to you!

Have a look at our meals!

How it works ‐ simple as 1, 2, 3

1

Choose the subscription plan that best suits you.

2

Order your delicious meal using our mobile app or website.

3

Enjoy your meal after less than 20 minutes.
